title: Definition of Statistic
text: The statistic is the measured value from the sample. For instance, if the parameter was to measure the average hours a student studies at a specific college, the statistic would specify the average hours a student studies in the sample that was taken to survey. An easier way to think about statistic is that it measures exactly the same thing as the parameter does, just for a subset of the population. In this study, the statistic is the proportion of driver dummies (if they had been real people) who would have suffered head injuries in the sample.
